lines.text: You know, Felipe, there's something suspicious about all this.
Senor, we shall consult the cards. They never fail. Ah, they never fail.
lines.character: Felipe Guadalupe Constacio Delgado Santa Cruz de la Verranca

lines.text: Aw, stick those cards in your...

lines.character: Felipe Guadalupe Constacio Delgado Santa Cruz de la Verranca
